ingredients.item: 1 pack 2 essential Waitrose Little Gem Lettuces, sliced
400g can red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
156g pack Old El Paso 12 Crunchy Taco Shells
½ x 28g pack Cooks’ Ingredients Coriander, chopped

instructions.step: Mix together the little gems, kidney beans, olives, radishes, celery and 1 diced avocado in a large bowl.
Place the remaining avocado, soured cream, pibil paste and lime juice in a small food processor and blitz until smooth, then season. Toss half of this into the salad.
Spoon into the taco shells and drizzle the remaining dressing on top. Sprinkle over the coriander and serve.
